attributes.action: SCRAP THE BACK DATING OF THE NEW CAR ROAD TAX BANDS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am fed up of paying for so called green taxes when in reality only 10% of the 50 BILLION raised each year by the motorist goes back into the roads, when will the hard pressed motorist get a break, we cant all ride bikes and get buses to get on with our lives, we have children to get to school and then get ourselves to work. Scrap this unfair back dating NOW, I wonder why this was 'hidden' in the small print of the budget like a double glazing contract?!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
